name: Alula
description:
Alula is a stargazing gardening game about what it means to be alone in the universe. You find yourself on an island alone receiving messages in bottles. You slowly discover why you’re there and who’s sending you the messages.

Constellation Puzzles

Potter about solving constellation-based puzzles, growing plants, and decorating your island in a wholesome and lush space.

Garden Management

Manage your time carefully. Care for your island and try not to have your head in the sky for too long to stay balanced.

Community

Join a digital commune of gardeners and connect your creations with others in space and time.
